examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐ huān xué xí Zhōng wén.

examples.chinese: 他们每天都在学习数学。
examples.pinyin: Tā men měi tiān dōu zài xué xí shù xué.
Xué xí kě yǐ ràng wǒ men chéng zhǎng.
Tā shì wǒ de hǎo péng yǒu.

examples.chinese: 我们一起去看电影，成为了好朋友。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ men yī qǐ qù kàn diàn yǐng, chéng wéi le hǎo péng yǒu.
examples.english: We went to the movies and became good friends.

examples.pinyin: Péng yǒu zhī jiān yào hù xiāng bāng zhù.
Wǒ měi tiān hē hěn duō shuǐ.
examples.english: I drink a lot of water every day.

examples.pinyin: Chí táng lǐ de shuǐ hěn qīng chè.
examples.english: The water in the pond is very clear.

examples.pinyin: Shuǐ shì shēng mìng de yuán quán.
examples.english: Water is the source of life.

examples.pinyin: Tā de shǒu jī diū le.
Wǒ yòng shǒu jī pāi zhào piàn.
examples.english: I take pictures with my phone.

examples.pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shǒu jī tiáo chéng jìng yīn.
examples.english: Please put your phone on silent.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ zuò huǒ chē qù Běi jīng.
examples.english: I take the train to Beijing.

examples.pinyin: Huǒ chē wǎn diǎn le.
Huǒ chē zhàn hěn yōng jǐ.
Jīn tiān de tiān qì hěn hǎo。

examples.chinese: 天气预报说明天会下雨。
examples.pinyin: Tiān qì yù bào shuō míng tiān huì xià yǔ。
examples.english: The weather forecast says it will rain tomorrow.

examples.chinese: 寒冷的天气让人想呆在家里。
examples.pinyin: Hán lěng de tiān qì ràng rén xiǎng dāi zài jiā lǐ。
examples.english: Cold weather makes people want to stay home.

examples.chinese: 这件衣服的价格太高了。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiàn yī fú de jià gé tài gāo le。
examples.english: The price of this shirt is too expensive.

examples.chinese: 市场上的价格随时在变化。
examples.pinyin: Shì chǎng shàng de jià gé suí shí zài biàn huà。
examples.english: Prices in the market change constantly.

examples.chinese: 你能给我一个更低的价格吗？
examples.pinyin: Nǐ néng gěi wǒ yī gè gèng dī de jià gé ma？
examples.english: Can you give me a lower price?

examples.pinyin: Wǒ měi tiān zǎo shàng qù xué xiào。
examples.english: I go to school every morning.

examples.pinyin: Xué xiào lǐ yǒu hěn duō lǎo shī。
examples.english: There are many teachers in the school.

examples.pinyin: Xué xiào de shí táng hěn hǎo chī。
examples.english: The school's cafeteria food is delicious.

examples.pinyin: Tā shì yī míng wài kē yī shēng。
Yī shēng gěi wǒ kāi le yào。
Yī shēng shuō wǒ xū yào xiū xi。
examples.english: The doctor said I need to rest.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ men qù kàn diàn yǐng ba。
Zhè bù diàn yǐng hěn hǎo kàn。
Diàn yǐng piào tài guì le。
Wǒ xǐ huān chī shuǐ guǒ。

examples.chinese: 这里有各种各样的水果。
examples.pinyin: Zhè lǐ yǒu gè zhǒng gè yàng de shuǐ guǒ。
examples.english: They have all kinds of fruits here.

examples.pinyin: Zhè gè shuǐ guǒ hěn tián。
Chāo shì shì yī zhǒng dà xíng shāng diàn。
examples.english: A supermarket is a large store.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ qù shāng diàn mǎi dōng xī。
examples.english: I go to the store to buy things.

examples.chinese: 这个商店不卖电子产品。
examples.pinyin: Zhè ge shāng diàn bù mài diàn zǐ chǎn pǐn。
examples.english: This store does not sell electronics.

examples.pinyin: Xià zhōu wǒ yào cān jiā kǎo shì。
examples.english: I have an exam next week.

examples.pinyin: Kǎo shì hěn nán, wǒ xū yào fù xí。
examples.english: The exam is hard, I need to review.

examples.pinyin: Tā zài kǎo shì zhōng kǎo dé hěn hǎo。
examples.english: He did very well on the exam.

examples.pinyin: Tā zài yī yuàn gōng zuò。
Wǒ xū yào qù yī yuàn kàn yī shēng。
examples.english: I need to go to the hospital to see a doctor.

examples.chinese: 医院门口有很多救护车。
examples.pinyin: Yī yuàn mén kǒu yǒu hěn duō jiù hù chē。
examples.english: There are many ambulances in front of the hospital.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ de lǎo shī hěn yán gé。
Lǎo shī jiào wǒ men shù xué。
Lǎo shī zài hēi bǎn shàng xiě zì。
examples.english: The teacher is writing on the blackboard.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī zhāng chē piào。
Chē piào duō shǎo qián？
Qǐng bǎo guǎn hǎo nín de chē piào。
Tā hěn nǔ lì de xué xí。
Zhǐ yào nǔ lì jiù néng chéng gōng。
examples.english: If you work hard, you can succeed.

examples.pinyin: Nǔ lì gōng zuò huì yǒu huí bào。
Zhè shì yī gè nán dé de jī huì。
Bǎ wò jī huì qù cháng shì。

examples.chinese: 每个人都应该珍惜机会。
examples.pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yīng gāi zhēn xī jī huì。
Wǒ de diàn nǎo huài le。
Tā zài diàn nǎo shàng gōng zuò。
Nǐ huì yòng diàn nǎo ma？
Zhè zuò sēn lín hěn měi lì。
Wǒ men qù sēn lín lǐ sàn bù。
examples.english: We go for a walk in the forest.

examples.pinyin: Sēn lín lǐ yǒu hěn duō dòng wù。
examples.english: There are many animals in the forest.

examples.chinese: 我们要了解不同的文化。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ men yào liǎo jiě bù tóng de wén huà。
examples.english: We need to understand different cultures.

examples.pinyin: Wén huà yí chǎn hěn zhòng yào。
Chéng shì de wén huà fēn wéi hěn nóng。
examples.english: The city has a strong cultural atmosphere.

examples.pinyin: Yùn dòng duì jiàn kāng hěn zhòng yào。

examples.chinese: 饮食要均衡才能保持健康。
examples.pinyin: Yǐn shí yào jūn héng cái néng bǎo chí jiàn kāng。
examples.english: You need a balanced diet to stay healthy.

examples.chinese: 医生说我的身体很健康。
examples.pinyin: Yī shēng shuō wǒ de shēn tǐ hěn jiàn kāng。
examples.english: The doctor says I’m very healthy.

examples.pinyin: Wǒ men xià gè yuè qù lǚ yóu。
Lǚ yóu kě yǐ kāi kuò shì yě。
Wǒ xǐ huān gēn tuán lǚ yóu。
Jiào yù duì yī gè rén hěn zhòng yào。
examples.english: Education is important for a person.

examples.pinyin: Zhèng fǔ yào tí gāo jiào yù zhì liàng。
examples.english: The government must improve education quality.

examples.pinyin: Jiā tíng jiào yù yě hěn guān jiàn。
Jīng jì fā zhǎn hěn kuài。

examples.chinese: 他在职业上有很大发展。
examples.pinyin: Tā zài zhí yè shàng yǒu hěn dà fā zhǎn。
examples.english: He has great development in his career.

examples.chinese: 发展中国家需要更多帮助。
examples.pinyin: Fā zhǎn zhōng guó jiā xū yào gèng duō bāng zhù。
Tā xǐ huān xué xí kē xué。
Kē xué jì shù zài jìn bù。
Kē xué jiā zài shí yàn shì gōng zuò。

examples.chinese: 我们要了解不同的文化。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ men yào liǎo jiě bù tóng de wén huà。
examples.english: We need to understand different cultures.

examples.pinyin: Wén huà yí chǎn hěn zhòng yào。
Chéng shì de wén huà fēn wéi hěn nóng。
examples.english: The city has a strong cultural atmosphere.

examples.pinyin: Zhōng guó de jīng jì zài zēng zhǎng。
Wǒ men yào xué huì guǎn lǐ jīng jì。
examples.english: We need to learn economic management.

examples.pinyin: Jīng jì wēi jī yǐng xiǎng hěn dà。
examples.english: The economic crisis had a huge impact.

examples.pinyin: Tā duì yì shù hěn gǎn xìng qù。
examples.english: He is very interested in art.

examples.pinyin: Zhè fú huà shì yī jiàn yì shù pǐn。
examples.english: This painting is a piece of art.

examples.pinyin: Yì shù jié xià zhōu jǔ xíng。
examples.english: The arts festival is next week.
